page.title: 17DAY IN LIFE OF MR.WAINWRIGHT
page.content: My name is Bob Wainwright,I work at Dover's Eastern Docks as a clerk dealing with Transit documents for the large lorries which pass through the port. The company I work for is called the Dover Clearance Service. I'm also a part time fireman and I'm on call for the Kent Fire Brigade stationed in St.Margarert's. A typical day would be_ wake at 4.50am_get dressed,have breakfast and leave for work at 5.30am. I work a 12 hour shift_checking papers all day. I arrive home at about 6.15pm. After my tea I change and go off to the Fire Brigade drill night(Monday). There we clean the engine and make sure all the gear is in working order. Then we practise using the equipment. I get home around 10.00pm when I have a cup of tea and go to bed.
